title: Termrr see your Stripe MRR in terminal
author: dstpierre
content: readme.md termrr ( terminal mrr) wanted have quick answer the question: "'s current mrr" roadmap. kind pass majority my in terminal, i built simple tool. is sample the output:mrr is 425.00month month stats=====================================2017-05 customers: 1 mrr: 25.002017-04 customers: 1 mrr: 50.002017-03 customers: 1 mrr: 55.002017-02 customers: 2 mrr: 80.002017-01 customers: 1 mrr: 95.002016-12 customers: 2 mrr: 120.00's showing mrr month month customers added mrr that month.installationbinary can download binary your platform the releases page. you go installed get github.com/dstpierre/termrrusage only need pass stripe key (live test).termrr -key stripe_key_here may have environment variable stripe_key.export stripe_key=sk_test_1234567termrr
